channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for WA
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for WA

item.title: Report X-2024040188
item.description:
Report X-2024040188

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-12T15:11:11+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-04
  • City: TUKWILA
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: FIBREBOARD BOX WAS DISCOVERED BY AN AUDITOR WHO THEN NOTIFIED A RESPONDER. ALL PPE (GLOVES, GOGGLES, BOOTS, APRON, SILVER LINING) WERE PUT ON AND FIBREBOARD BOX WAS PLACED INTO A YELLOW TUB/DMP BAG. FIBREBOARD BOX WAS THEN TRANSFERRED TO THE DMP FOR FURTHER PROCESSING. ALL TUBS/PPE WERE THEN DECONTAMINATED AND FIBREBOARD BOX WAS THEN ENTERED INTO ETT.

item.title: Report E-2024040122
item.description:
Report E-2024040122

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-09T15:11:35+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-04-02
  • City: KENT
  • State: WA
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: CLEAN HARBORS ENVIRONMENTAL SERVICES, INC.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Approximately 1800 on 4/2/2024 an employee was conducting a yard check and discovered a liquid leaking from the back of a trailer. A clean up team was contacted and proceeded to contain leak and clean up spill. Approximately five gallons was released. Spill was cleaned up and repacked for transport.
